projects.name: DoDo
projects.description: DoDo is a ToDo website where users can create an account and enter their ToDos. This project was my first practical application of React.js.

projects.name: BudgetBooster
projects.description: BudgetBooster, a game I developed using Next.js, is hosted on our own server. It teaches teenagers about wise financial decisions through a fun and engaging gameplay.

projects.name: Furt
projects.description: Furt ist a Mobiel Game about Colors. The Player has to Shoot the color in the right area and avoid obstacels. The Game is made with Unity and runs on Android
